64 EXPERT XP 
EXPERT XP is our digital content platform, with a Research group of over 30 specialists, serving 
retail clients in Portuguese and institutional clients in English. The digital platform dedicated to 
clients is free and has more than 1 million single monthly visitors. The EXPERT XP conference has 
become the largest investment event in Latin America. Due to the COVID-19 pandemic, the 2020 
edition was 100% digital and free, attracting some 500,000 participants. 
  
Fliper  
Fliper  is a platform with more than 350 thousand active accounts, which was developed to 
facilitate financial control. The client consolidates all the assets in a single place and starts to 
make an intelligent management of the investments, all totally automatically.
